triangle

Class Major

  • java.lang.Object
    • triangle.Major

  • public class Major
extends java.lang.Object
    Given a java program, a Major object provides functionality such as compiling and generating mutants.
    Author:
    Raymond Tang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Major(java.io.File program)
      By default, mutant source files are not generated.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the export directory of mutants.log.

      Returns the mutants.log file.

      Returns true if the option to generate mutant source files is set to true.

      Sets the exportDirectory property to the given directory.
      void setExportMutants(boolean exportMutants)
      Sets the exportMutants property to either true or false.

      Sets the mutants.log directory to the given directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Major

        public Major(java.io.File program)
      throws java.io.IOException
        By default, mutant source files are not generated. If the option to generate mutant source files is set to true, then the default export directory is "./mutants". A FileNotFoundException is thrown if the program does not exist. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the program is not a java file.
        Parameters:
        program - a java File
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • mutate

        public boolean mutate()
        Compile and generate mutants. Returns true if successful. Returns false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true for success and false otherwise

      • isExportMutants

        public boolean isExportMutants()
        Returns true if the option to generate mutant source files is set to true. Returns false otherwise.
        Returns:
        the value of the exportMutants property

      • setExportMutants

        public void setExportMutants(boolean exportMutants)
        Sets the exportMutants property to either true or false.
        Parameters:
        exportMutants - the value to which the exportMutants property will be set

      • getExportDirectory

        public java.io.File getExportDirectory()
        Returns the export directory.
        Returns:
        the export directory

      • setExportDirectory

        public void setExportDirectory(java.io.File directory)
        Sets the exportDirectory property to the given directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory to which mutant source files will be exported

      • getMutantsLogFile

        public java.io.File getMutantsLogFile()
                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Returns the mutants.log file. Throws a FileNotFoundException if mutants.log does not exist.
        Returns:
        the mutants.log file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • getMutantsLog

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMutantsLog()
                                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Parses mutants.log into an ArrayList of strings. The i-th string in the ArrayList is the i-th line in mutants.log. Returns the ArrayList. Throws a NullPointerException if mutants.log does not exist.
        Returns:
        the mutants.log file parsed as an ArrayList
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • getMutantsLogDirectory

        public java.io.File getMutantsLogDirectory()
        Returns the export directory of mutants.log.
        Returns:
        the directory to which the mutants.log file is exported

      • setMutantsLogDirectory

        public void setMutantsLogDirectory(java.io.File directory)
        Sets the mutants.log directory to the given directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory to which the mutants.log file will be exported
